attributes.action: Conduct a full investigation into the pakistani grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: The Government must lead investigations into grooming gangs to deliver justice for victims,address systemic failures,and rebuild trust in institutions.Past inaction has eroded public confidence and allowed extremist narratives to exploit these crimes.A transparent inquiry ensures accountability without prejudice, prevents unjust stigmatization of communities.This action supports victims,fosters unity,and strengthens safeguarding measures,demonstrating that justice is prioritized over politics.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to fully investigate Pakistani grooming gangs on behalf of UK Muslims.Justice for victims & addressing systemic failures in safeguarding is vital.A transparent inquiry will ensure accountability, support survivors, and combat stigma while rebuilding trust in communities.

rejection.details:
